cont.entity_a: Has a very good bite, making it easy to pull out nails even when their heads come off.
Feels like it is made in China, despite being labeled as made in the USA.
Machine-made with sharp edges, lacking the hand-polished finish of older models.
Feels off compared to older models.
cont.entity_b: Excellent weight balance and shock reduction.

cont.entity_a: Good grip, well-balanced, and made of wood.
cont.entity_b: Rubber handle is not very durable.

cont.entity_a: Curved white hickory handle fits comfortably in the hand, with a 17-inch length for extended reach. Nice wood handle, but requires sharpening of the claw. Long, and the grip takes some getting used to. Thick.
cont.entity_b: Handle has a tendency to come loose and requires loc-tite. Has split and cracked, making it dangerous to use. Long handle can be inconvenient for belt loops. Too long and heavy, affecting balance.

cont.entity_a: Magnet to hold a nail, and a great axe handle design. Magnetic nail starter on the blue version is worth the extra money.
Wood on head wears over time but lasts well.
cont.entity_b: Handle is not very durable. Hammer broke after a year of use.

cont.entity_a: Hickory handles absorb shock better than other materials.
Glossy slick finish on the handle can be improved with sanding and tung oil.
A curved handle was ordered but a straight handle was received.
Great ergonomics of the handle, weight balance, and head shape.
Handles heavy gauge nails with ease.
Drives nails fine, with a good price point.

cont.entity_b: Hammer is very expensive but considered worth the investment. Price is high but justified for frequent users. Not worth $200.
Interchangeable heads are a valuable feature.

cont.entity_a: Due to its weight and balance.

cont.entity_b: Minimal vibrations with excellent power for its weight.
Hammer is extremely light with minimal vibration.
Durable and light, suitable for daily use.
Superior quality with a side nail puller. Effective for stubborn nails. Standout feature. Nail puller on the side is a valuable feature.
